name: Alien Egg: Ascent
description:
In Alien Egg: Ascent, you play as an alien egg coming out of hibernation in an abandoned laboratory. You are compelled by your instincts to escape the lab and jump your way into outer space in order to find a way back to your home planet.



Master the challenging art of jumping, rolling, and sliding your way up past the surface, into space, and through surreal alien environments. Simply click and drag to determine the power and direction of your jump, but beware: falls may be costly! Jump with care, and you may very well make it home to tell your alien buddies all about your adventure.
